website_summaries.verdict: The Guardzilla 360 indoor security camera can see an entire room, but it isn't all that easy to use.
pros: The $230 Guardzilla 360 is outfitted with a 360-degree livestreaming camera
it can see everything in a room at the same time.
The camera is also a self-contained security system with an integrated siren, arm/disarm modes and optional professional monitoring
cons: Guardzilla's glitchy app crashes unexpectedly and looks outdated

customer_reviews.title: Buggy
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and a lot smaller than I expected. The concept is neat with the 360 view, but the product and software is buggy. I finally had to give up on it when after less than a week, it would no longer arm. I would arm it, exit, go back in and it would be unarmed. I restarted a few times to no avail. A factory reset might work, but I don't have time to play around with it. Bottom line is I need a higher quality and stable device. BTW - their support is pretty good if you need to call about an issue.
customer_reviews.author: T. Corliss

customer_reviews.title: Without value.
customer_reviews.text: Guardzilla 360 video worked for a week. Unplugged it and plugged it in a week later and video does not work at all. Snapshot works--of the ceiling! No instructions to adjust camera or alter settings. No help, so far, from Guardzilla support. Very disappointing and would absolutely not recommend. Will advise if I can get it to work but it will require some valid support.
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy item camera quit working after one hour
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to be getting this camera and wanted some piece of mind.i dident get that at all,instead camera quit working after one hour.picture quality was ok well it worked.also there was about ten seconds of latency on the live feed.this is not the camera that will bring you piece of mind and reliability.spend your money on a different camera
customer_reviews.author: Kevin e smith

customer_reviews.title: Needs Much more development and work!
customer_reviews.text: Never worked properly, slow and unreliable. Two days ago it died, went black & white with very poor if any picture quality. Junk
customer_reviews.author: The King

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Video quality needs a lot of work. I gues you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tech-mom

customer_reviews.title: Guardzilla 360
customer_reviews.text: The 360 camera stopped working after two months. The technical support via email is a disaster! I changed to Heimvision security cameras. Excellent quality camera, price and real person tech support!
customer_reviews.author: Splash

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Setup was simple and fast. The 360 picture looks great and actually is a lot of fun to use. Lots of features with the siren, motion detection, smart phone alerts, and 2-way audio. We really like how we can just put on a table a see the entire room. We looked at other camera options and this was the only one that would cover the whole space.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera!! Easy set up, great picture of the whole room... exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McAllister

customer_reviews.title: 360 degree viewing & easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I have a Guardzilla indoor camera in my kitchen but I really wanted to see my entire living room (back door/windows, hallway from kitchen and hallway from front door). This is the only camera that I can find that is always recording in 360 (if armed). I also like the duplex audio to talk to the kids when they get home from school. Its really cool that I can follow people in my room with this camera. Setup was really easy with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Swag

customer_reviews.title: Regretted this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Never worked with my IPhone we tried with 4 different people's iPhones and it wouldn't work. Seemed to link up to androids bit the picture quality wasn't great
customer_reviews.author: Whitley Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Do not suggest you purchase !  I was trying to save money and it is so not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have called customer service so many times the guys knows my name and number - I am paying the extra money for storage of the videos and it does not take videos for me to review- -I feel sorry for the customer service guy because whatever is wrong with the camera is not something he can fix -- someone else has to fix it -- I call about every week trying to get the video hooked up -- I asked why it does not arm and disarm when I am entering or exiting the area - - he said they cannot get that to work so they are taking that option away - Awful awful product
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: You are on your own after you buy this
customer_reviews.text: They have terrible customer service, you can not speak to anyone and their emails are very hard to follow. I have ISO (iphone) and the auto arm stopped working, trying to understand how to correct the issues off of their instructions is like trying to solve the angel of the alignment of the Sun to the Moon back to the Earth and back to the Moon after it goes around Mars....it's freaking crazy!!! I loved it when I first got it.... but not so much now!
customer_reviews.author: Tbone

customer_reviews.title: Guardzilla has gone out of business do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Guardzilla has gone out of business camera will not work Guardzilla We deeply regret that these troubling times have caused us to close our doors. We are sorry for any inconvenience this has caused, as we will be unable to continue support for the Guardzilla product line.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked for about an hour....then went black.No motion detection or sirene going off.Very useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lakesidecudworth

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This camera is crap. Video quality is expected to be shotty but the features doesn't stay set. I set the siren to go off and best believe, I hear nothing. App is crap.
customer_reviews.author: JayOSmitty

customer_reviews.title: NO SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: Horrible couldn’t even set up my account to get it work no tech support, no you tube, very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: jo ann flores

customer_reviews.title: Not an outdooe camera
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was an outdoor camera. It is not. Returned it without a problem
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Fish bowl view. Needs to be in middle of room to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: S Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Eagle Eye at Its Finest.
customer_reviews.text: 360• is awesome technology. Lovin that concave convex whatever they call it imagery
customer_reviews.author: Orlanda Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Wish it recorded in real-time.
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this product. You need a subscription to record any event.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Camera never worked
customer_reviews.text: Never worked ! No one responded to my emails ! Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: their out if business don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The company no longer exists... so is useless without that mainframe.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying this product
customer_reviews.text: The ability to view and monitor video in 360 is awesome. I can view video in all directions from my phone. Night vision works great. The siren feature is nice to have when I need it. Setting up the product was quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Video stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to setup. Remote viewing worked really well but the video stopped working after only 4 months. After contacting Guardzilla for help, we first received a troubleshooting email reply. We tried all troubleshooting and, of course, a factory reset but still no video (picture). Guardzilla support refuses to believe their camera has gone bad. It has. We're left with a brick. Very disappointed! It was purchased at Best Buy but reviewed on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: FL  shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: beyond amazing! Truly brings 360 streaming to life....simply move your phone anywhere you wish and you're watching it live. You can also just swipe with your fingers, but its much more fun to rotate your phone. Coupled with the 2-way audio, I am at a loss of words to describe the interactive experience. Set up was super simple. Audio and picture quality are terrific. Motion detection (360 degrees) is also terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Sundevil!

customer_reviews.title: No repair or replacement option unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: The GZ360 keeps disconnecting it’s faulty I follow chat & email recommendations it didn’t work. I contact them to request repair or replacement no one respond... when it work is very good unfortunately for me I get a defective unit + no alternative to repair or replace!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro E. Mojica

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: First off, let me say I bought this from Wal-Mart. So, the camera worked fine for a day. Then the next day I unplugged it to move it somewhere else, and ever since it hasnt worked. It just blinks yellow. Not green, blue, or red. Yellow. I've reset it probably a dozen times in hopes that it would start working again because I was recently broken into, and it just does the same thing. Says its connected successfully, has me name the device, then nothing. I've tried to contact tech support but it doesn't exist. Do not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HACK-CAM and RIFF-OFF
customer_reviews.text: Be-cautious!!!__Guardzilla security is a declining company. All its selling products are discontinuing and dying. __I owned 2 of them, purchased 1 from Lowe and the second one from Walmart. 1st camera lasts about 8 months. 2nd about 10 months. Still under warranty. However, the company is lagged away from any claim.__Do not expect them for warranty. __Bestway is avoiding them and stay away from their products. __That all I can say. __Otherwise, you have to bear with a headache. __Goodluck.
customer_reviews.author: user v.v.

customer_reviews.title: Run away.  Run far, run fast.
customer_reviews.text: The hardware works. There's no question about it. The problem is the software and the lack of support from the manufacturer. Install the Android app and as soon as you try to use it, it crashes. Can't access the device because it requires the proprietary software. Try to access the Guardzilla website for customer support, the URL doesn't resolve to an IP address, which means the site is down. Save yourself the frustration. DON'T BUY THIS PIECE OF MANURE!
customer_reviews.author: WxMan

customer_reviews.title: Must buy, best camera on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have used yet. I have used other product before, and each one was missing something. I now know that it was missing the 360 degree technology. My family feels so safe now that this product is in our home. Video is so clear that it makes you feel at home at all times. Very excited about the app as well. Sure easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I got the Guardzilla 360 after I had a break in and this really gives me a peace of mind. It auto arms and disarms based on my phone location. Love being able to see what’s going on in my apartment whenever I want. Very user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: T. Weldon

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend buying this product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get this thing to install. There's no phone support and the chat support wouldn't work for me. I don't recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Guardzilla went out of business
customer_reviews.text: Guardzilla went out of business June 2020 so their entire product line is useless. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: K. Gagne

customer_reviews.title: company is out of business
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working so looked up Guardzilla to find out why. They have shut their doors for good.
customer_reviews.author: J Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Runaway from this.  Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to set up a new one today. Junk. Wanted you to buy a monthly subscription before camera even worked. Ha. Customer service told me to return it. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Company no longer exists
customer_reviews.text: Company closed no more service if you buy it good luck spending your money...
customer_reviews.author: Archimedes Lainez

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete
customer_reviews.text: Mine stopped working because the company shut down, Google it. If you buy it you will have to return it. I don’t understand why these Guardzilla products are still being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Guardzilla GZ360 360 HD Security Camera, Black
feature_bullets: Live 360 Degree HD video view in color from your smartphone. Hear and speak into the room through advanced speaker and microphone.
360º advanced passive infrared (pir) motion detectors. Motion sensors send phone alerts (email and/or push notifications) when camera is armed and motion is detected. 100dB siren deters intruders.
Auto-engaging 360º night vision and auto arming and disarming.
Three (3) dedicated Call buttons on camera instantly message individual smartphones (E.G. Mom, dad, sister)
Installation-free five-minute setup with the free App

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.4 out of 5 stars74 ratings2.4 out of 5 stars
